column1: You will notice a definite difference in your skin! I love this face cream! If you see it in the store, buy it! This product is always sold out!

I have suffered from acne since i was about 9 years old, i am now 22. I use clean and clear deep action cleansing cream to wash my face and use the ponds as my cream and it has been the best duo ever for the past three years!!!
didn't really do anything.. i've been using it for years.
